description: Learn how to make the perfect burnt butterscotch sauce. This deep golden caramel sauce boasts a rich flavour. Pour it over cakes, ice cream and sticky date pudding.
name: Burnt Butterscotch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook for 3 minutes or until foamy and golden brown. Stir in sugar and thickened cream, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until thickened.
